original_text: And they will deceive every one his neighbour, and will not speak the truth: they have taught their tongue to speak lies, and weary themselves to commit iniquity.
korean_text: 그들은 각기 이웃을 속이며 진실을 말하지 아니하며 그들의 혀로 거짓말하기를 가르치며 악을 행하기에 지치거늘

sentences.original_text: And they will deceive every one his neighbour
and will not speak the truth
they have taught their tongue to speak lies
and weary themselves to commit iniquity
